content:
VERIFICATION REPORT. ves version 3

The verification team has verified the calibration records and the accreditation certificates of the calibration entity. All the meters meet the rated accuracy level as described in the monitoring plan and are in compliance with the industry standard Technical Administrative Code of Electric Energy Metering (DL/T 448-2000)?" The calibration frequency fulfills the requirement as described in the monitoring plan and is in compliance with the national standard Verification Regulation of Electrical Energy Meter with Electronics (JJG 596-1999) ?"),
